# Flask-X-OpenAPI-Schema

> A powerful utility for automatically generating OpenAPI schemas from Flask-RESTful resources, Flask.MethodView classes, and Pydantic models.

A powerful utility for automatically generating OpenAPI schemas from Flask-RESTful resources, Flask.MethodView classes, and Pydantic models to simplify API documentation with minimal effort.

## Getting Started

- [Getting Started](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/getting_started/index.md)

## Architecture

- [Architecture](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/architecture/index.md)

## Usage Guide

- [Overview](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/core_components/index.md)
- [Parameter Binding](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/parameter_binding/index.md)
- [Response Handling](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/response_handling/index.md)
- [Schema Generation](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/schema_generation/index.md)
- [Usage Guide](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/usage_guide/index.md)

## Features

- [File Uploads](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/file_uploads/index.md)
- [Internationalization](https://straydragon.github.io/flask-x-openapi-schema/internationalization/index.md)
